alert.note: Alert for Scott (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 25 at 6:12PM EDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Sullivan, southeastern Claiborne, Hawkins, Washington, Hancock, northern Greene, northeastern Grainger, northern Carter, northeastern Hamblen and southeastern Scott Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 612 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Gate City to near Rogersville to near Tazewell. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Johnson City, Kingsport, Morristown, Bristol Tn, Elizabethton, Rogersville, Gate City, Sneedville, Jonesborough and New Tazewell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
